website_summaries.verdict: This watch is rugged enough to withstand hiking, mountain climbing and swimming, but looks good enough to wear just about anywhere.
pros: It's solar powered, has a barometer, thermometer, compass, altimeter and atomic accuracy
It also looks great, is tough as nails, features a clock and alarms
Its water resistance is suited to scuba diving
cons: This watch is expensive and some will find it too large
The watch face is hard for some to read at night in spite of a lighted dial

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch, needs more Glow-In-The-Dark on the hands.
customer_reviews.text: Love almost everything about this watch. 2 caveats that won't make a dang bit of difference to the manufacturer, but you should know about: 1. The carbon fiber insert band is nice and rugged... however I would highly recommend a titanium band. 2. The hands look like they are full Glow-In-The-Dark (GITD). NOTHING could be further from the truth. There's just a hint of a speck of GITD paint and they are VERY hard to read in the dark. The watch does have a pretty nice light on it, but that's a little obnoxious when you're trying see what time it is while camping.
customer_reviews.author: Scoutmaster Tech

customer_reviews.title: I love this 6000 even more than my 6100.
customer_reviews.text: This was a no brainer at $400 for me. In the pic I've posted, my PRW-6100YT is on the right. It has the sapphire crystal and titanium bracelet. My PRW-6000Y-1ACR is on the left. IMO it's a much better looking watch. I love the green accents and the hour and minute hands, as well as the bezel markers. The YT does have better lum because of the solid hands, but both have the same LED lights. Overall at about $250 cheaper, I think the 6000 is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Bill K.

customer_reviews.title: Not the watch you want. Not even sure it is a Casio
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for some pretty tough travel. The trip was for three weeks at Aconcagua, Argentina. I am very disappointed in watch performance. The sapphire bezel scratched very easily. I've have a number of watches with sapphire and this can't be made of sapphire. In addition, the display and mode buttons failed. I'll see if Casio will service the watch. However, I suspect this one is a fake.
customer_reviews.author: john f. donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older similar (digital only) Casio with this model. Looks nice and clearly more dressy. I like the Casio line for two main reasons - solar charging and world time and it's the latter where this falls short. Selecting the destination city is difficult - the city abbreviations around the bevel can be difficult to see unless there's very bright direct light as the codes are often difficult to see in dim light or the bevel shades the codes. Okay, I'll use the LCD display but - unlike my old trusty digital model it doesn't show the city code but just "CITY". Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Martin H. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch in every way, took one star off because..
customer_reviews.text: the crown button easily goes into the set up mode if you wear this watch on the left hand and bend your wrist upward while doing heavy work such as exercise in the gym (e.g. push ups). Another negative is that it is hard to read the liquid crystal display. I wish there was a way to reverse the display to black on white instead of white on black. It is a great value for money when on sale around $200 which is what I got it for. I would not have bought it for more than $250.
customer_reviews.author: mavern

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but the learning curve is steep.
customer_reviews.text: Thought a watch that did everything itself would be easy to use, not so much. Also thought that a modern technologically advanced watch would be easy to read in the dark, not so much. That being said, I do love this thing. After reading the manual and only pulling out the parts I really need to understand. It isn't too difficult to work. I really wish the lume and/or the light was better. I do love the look and feel of the watch and traveling with it is fun. Hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Debora

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch 😉
customer_reviews.text: Great watch so far, very accurate reading's. I luv all the features on it, but not having to worry about battery replacement is what sold me. I have 3 other watches 1 Casio twin sensor, smart watch & 1 fossil, they have great features BUT every year or so the batteries go dead. I also have to charge the smart watch every night ugggg. This protrek looks great works great and I will most likely have to change the battery in about 10+ years.😉
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Strong Features in a Durable Watch
customer_reviews.text: I love watches owning everything from high end luxury Tag to high tech Suunto to cheap timex. This watch has a great feature set. It's easy to use, easy to read, and I find the accuracy for time excellent. The temperature is always off when it sits on your wrist. I find it to be about 10degrees higher than ambient temperature, so I just keep that in mind when looking. The altimeter and compass seem to be spot on. It does take more time than desired to catch the GPS time, but when it does, I love knowing it's spot on. It's attractive for a sport/outdoor watch, but I wouldn't wear it for a formal occasion.
customer_reviews.author: H. Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: A rare 5-star - Amazing watch
customer_reviews.text: I always like this watch but it is a little pricey for my need. One day it went on sales for half the price and I thought it would be a crime to walk away. I looks even more gorgeous in person and the functionality is even better. My most favorite so far. Well, I love all my watches, but this one, a little more than the other :D. I rarely rate anything 5-star, unless it is exceptional. And this is one, first.
customer_reviews.author: ironbadge

customer_reviews.title: I like thiswatch very much
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch very much. It looks great, it is not too large, and it is very comfortable to wear. Compass works well. Barometer is useful to monitor trends. I don't need if for much else. Altimeter is also useful for following trends. I have not tested it for accuracy and really don't need it to be accurate. Dial illuminator is a very nice feature. I have one criticism/concern: The crown only requires 1/2 a turn to lock. I have found on many occasions with simply movement of my wrist that the crown will unlock and release. This will create problems with water resistance if that occurs while in or near water.
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable watch. Nice low profile. Functions are off the hook. Style points are a little lacking though. My wife says it's too practical and not very stylish. She says I should get my fanny pack and velcro shoes out to match. What does she know!
customer_reviews.author: T. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Watch
customer_reviews.text: LOVING this watch. Seller is amazing. Ordered on a Thursday and received the following Monday from FedEX. I have 4 Casio watches and 6 Citizen Eco Drive and at this point in time this my favorite watch. Looks elegant, very light weight and has many functions. I'm used to Casio watches so setting up and going thru the functions is pretty easy. Edit: After 4 years this is still my Favorite Watch. This is my everyday wear watch. I work in a Distribution Center and have bumped this watch many times and NOT 1 scratch or dent. Very Durable. This is without question this is my Favorite Watch and I own $1000 watches.
customer_reviews.author: Ghodzilla5150

customer_reviews.title: For an outdoors person escaping technology dependency
customer_reviews.text: Extremely accurate compass and elevation. No issues on time. The fact that power is a plus, camped and hiked in Mojave Dessert and entered caves, at no time the watch malfunctioned and holds good power to light the watch inside caves. Is my daily watch and will remain such for years to come. Ditch a Fenix-5 for this one. Since it does not have a GPS just ensure you are either good with a map or good on pacing. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Cres T. Padilla

customer_reviews.title: This is "The Ultimate wrist watch"
customer_reviews.text: I can wear it 24/7 and very comfortable. Watch has big display easy to read. Functions are very practical and durable. Highly recommended, It looks good with suits too!
customer_reviews.author: Sean J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch. Wore it on 90' dive. Carbon fiber band lasted 3yrs.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Even wore it during a dive (90 feet). Only negative is the minute hand is a little hard to see in dark settings. Other than that, all features work great. Updates: 3years later, watch band broke. The carbon fiber does Not fully cover where the band holds onto the hinges, making the whole carbon fiber a bit useless as far as strength goes. Carbon fiber should fully cover where it attaches to the hinges as this is where it is most likely to break.
customer_reviews.author: David Castro

customer_reviews.title: Very, very, very nice watch.
customer_reviews.text: I'll say one thing...going from an equivalent size steel watch is like taking an anvil off my wrist. I like it. I will swap it back and forth with my big atomic Citizen, one for dress, this new one for most everything else. VERY handsom look, surprisingly thin. Love all the functions, that's what I got it for. Another surprise is the overall ease of use re modes, navigation between, etc. MUCH more intuitive than the Citizen. Buying on Amazon for half of list price is also pretty amazing. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Blackhorse

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my husband who is extremely ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband who is extremely picky and expects alot and he absolutely loves this watch. He gets alot of compliments on it and seems to discover new things about it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Margaret woodrum

customer_reviews.title: Manuals
customer_reviews.text: I've read about 20 of the reviews and can't really add anything. I own 4 Casio watches and the instruction manuals on all of them are pretty bad. Casio really needs to hire some top notch technical writers. Fortunately I've gotten some help on YOUTUBE.
customer_reviews.author: William Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Watch
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch, great price! I live outdoors in the mountains and on the water and this watch does everything I need it to do. I backpack and canoe old school with map and compass but the features on the watch keep me from having to take lengthy stops to navigate every time. I also travel around the country a lot so the atomic time keeping feature works perfect. All of the features are extremely accurate while wearing the watch except the temp. I hang it up in the tent at night and it keeps temp fine that way. Thanks for passing on the great savings!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sapphire lense (-1ACR models) with a carbon fiber band
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sapphire lense (-1ACR models) with a carbon fiber band. Comfortable and reasonably sized considering all the technology contained within. Works as described and pretty easy to learn the functions. Directions come with the box and are very easy to understand. The triple sensors work well. The compass and altimeter have been spot on with no adjustments necessary. The barometer and temperature readings may need some minor adjustment for your respective area but once set have functioned perfectly. When you're wearing the watch, you will get a higher temp reading--1 to 2 degrees. I love this watch--function, looks and price. Buy it while you still can.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my walk-a-bouts and fishing expeditions without lugging around ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a multifunction watch for several years and the Pro Trek turned out to be the Holy Grail. The watch is user friendly, light,accurate, and wrapped in a compact package. Perfect for my walk-a-bouts and fishing expeditions without lugging around a laptop on your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kupa

customer_reviews.title: Chose the Casio Atomic Solar PRW 6000 over the Suunto. Very happy I did.
customer_reviews.text: Well built, easy to use all of the features. Comfortable to wear and its night time illumination is superb. NO BATTERIES....EVER! The MOST ACCURATE time keeping on the planet! Carbon fiber in the wrist strap.... Casio just keeps building them better and better. Thinner than my GSHOCK, fits great.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Looks Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 6 year old casio Pathfinder That looked and worked great. I wanted to get the exact replacement but casio discontinued it. I was told by casio customer service this was the replacement. compared to my less expensive Pathfinder this watch looks cheap the band is light duty and the watch itself is pretty boring looking. I am sure it will perform well just wish it looked like a $400 watch
customer_reviews.author: Garry C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable on my wrist. I added a KHAOS tempered glass shield to cristal face. It should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Juangarcia

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my husband who is a firefighter/tactical medic. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who is a firefighter/tactical medic. He comments on it often, about how much he likes it. And says he receives compliments on it from team members as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Vinson

customer_reviews.title: Good Watch
customer_reviews.text: It's light, easy to read, awesome crown feature, cool band, and mine has a small rattle. Not sure if this is normal. The LCD is harder to read then the opposite (Black on White), glowing hands are super dim, but I love this watch. On a side note, my other ProTrek stopped keeping time after I split a bunch of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I have had a chance to wear and use this watch I can say it's pretty good. I replaced a Casio Pathfinder that I have been using since 2005. I can also add 2 Suunto Vectors as well. The Protrek is smaller and lighter than the Pathfinder and Vectors. All of these watches do the same stuff and the Protrek does it better. It is WAY more comfortable to wear than the Pathfinder and it looks a lot better than all of them. The measurements are far more precise. Which really isn't a surprise since they have had over a decade to improve the technology. I am definitely looking forward to using and enjoying this watch for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Best line of watches ever
customer_reviews.text: I own three Pro-Tek atomic watches. Best and only line I buy. Super intuitive, great for world travel. Love the carbon fiber band.
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: While I like the face I totally dislike the systems of adjustments ...
customer_reviews.text: While I like the face I totally dislike the systems of adjustments that are a mixture of manual and automatic (depending where you live) but for the cost what's better for day to day usage are handfuls of other brands. Why did I buy this, I foolishly believed Casio would have done something much, much, much smarter? Am I regretting it, yes, but I have the old model that is way easier to manage.
customer_reviews.author: silverhands

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I love my watch, I do wish that the digital screen was a bit bigger and brighter to read during daytime. Recommended product
customer_reviews.author: Diego D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch...period.
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch for so many reasons. It’s durable, useful, dependable and just an amazing value. I wear this watch everyday and feel naked without it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Casio pro trek 6000y acr blk
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looking very accurate almost perfect watch.My problem for returning it was because I could not hear the alarms and The hands were in the way of the small dark Window showing settings.should have been a lighter color that would make it easier to see. Very hard to figure out the controls .Casio customer phone support was great .5 stars The watch dial looks amazing .Hard to see at night.Small light at bottom of dial not helpfull. In the end I sent it back too complicated and The hands just got in the way.Would have been my 4th casio pathfinder watch and best looking. The band was comfortable and leaves no marks.
customer_reviews.author: river1

customer_reviews.title: The Best Watch I ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I am having a good time with this Watch, I am getting use to all the things that it can do even though I'm only using it to keep Perfect Time. I like everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Photoguy930

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for an outdoor type activities person.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a month now and love it. As long as you realize thermometers on watchers will never be accurate if they're on your wrist (it adds your body heat) and the barometer needs to be calibrated. Once you have that knowledge, I absolutely love this watch. For the capabilities it has, for what I paid for it, it has far exceeded my expectations. Seems rugged enough, and the carbon fiber band is light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I like, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: I've had no negative issues with the watch. Love the look. Then again, I'm no watch snob. The thing works well, fits well and for me the "gadgets " have been close enough. I'd buy again
customer_reviews.author: Ralph l Carr iv

customer_reviews.title: What a watch, man. Couldn’t recommend enough!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch in May of 2015 and have worn it every single day and I could not have been happier. Unfortunately, the crystal broke today from an impact but I will absolutely be purchasing another one. I don’t have a single negative thing to say about this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Grawehr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch for hiking and the outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch for hiking and the outdoors. Stylish, durable, and lightweight. Took it on a mountaineering trip to the Alps and all the features worked great. Was nice not to need to worry about the battery (lots of people out there with dead Garmins and Suuntos).
customer_reviews.author: Joel Fleischmann

customer_reviews.title: This is the beautiful watch! The carbon fiber wristband is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: This is the beautiful watch! The carbon fiber wristband is outstanding. Sometimes I forget that I'm wearing it. Display light, altimeter,barometer,and temperature work fine. Got my watch on time, even when there was bad weather. Love this watch and recommend this watch and seller.
customer_reviews.author: michael greene

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an upgrade to my PRW-5100. More comfortable band, thinner profile, and much easier to use. Well worth the upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: mikemike

customer_reviews.title: ... in the Wind River Range and found them very useful. The altimeter required re-calibrating at times for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Used the altimeter and compass functions on a backpacking trip in the Wind River Range and found them very useful. The altimeter required re-calibrating at times for the best accuracy, but was not difficult to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: thanks
customer_reviews.text: great watch, but complicated and needs a better light or illuminated dials and hands would be good.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good watch. A little pricey. But I catch every staring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Lots of functions. No issues at all. The green is subtle but a nice touch. Carbon fiber band is surprisingly pliable and comfortable. Pricy but seems worth it so far.
customer_reviews.author: P. Puckhaber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch with excellent build quality and specs. Love to wear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and comply the functions described
customer_reviews.text: It's resistant, beautiful and comply the functions described!. Easily in light load; It is visually showy.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Giovanni Bejarano B

customer_reviews.title: very good - the only negatives are not being able to ...
customer_reviews.text: very good - the only negatives are not being able to set the altimeter based on area QNH (predicted sea level atmospheric pressure) and no automatic time corrections when outside the VLF stations' service areas i.e. use GPS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch just wish it had a light
customer_reviews.author: Alan W.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Brand new watch and the second hand does not work.
customer_reviews.author: a_zahov

customer_reviews.title: Really nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I will never change the time and the battery manually, and it is authentic from Japan. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: It's good looking, tough - BUT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my EMT son. He absolutely LOVES it. It's good looking, tough, durable and no more battery changes ever! One ot his favorable comments was how is sits slim on his wrist. It has much less bulk that his previous pathfinder. FAST FORWARD TO DECEMBER 2016. WATCH NOW FOGS UP AND IS UNUSEABLE. DON'T GET IT WET. DON'T GO IN AND OUT OF HOT/COLD BUILDINGS. On the positive side I called Amazon Customer Service and they are letting me return it. Thank You Amazon Customer Service! My son likes this watch so we're going to try another one from Casio via Amazon. Hopefully the new one will be up to spec.
customer_reviews.author: JJB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Watch is just right in size..... A little pricey but otherwise great
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, particularly the fact I don't have to charge or replace batteries. All functions work well, though haven't really tested altimeter yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Erik Ween

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I got good price and it's worthy price also and , nice service and nice look and comfortable use.
customer_reviews.author: Priyankkumar Shah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely love it. Size is perfect as well as the functions.
customer_reviews.author: KoalaInGTR

customer_reviews.title: Casio Watch
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a watch to replace my older Casio Pathfinder series watch. This one was priced right and came with all the features I wanted. It arrived packed great. the band is a lot more thinner than expected, however the watch is sturdy and looks great. Very practical, but not really a watch for someone who is seriously active and bangs their watch around when participating in active sports or activities. Packaging was fine. The shipping box was the right size for the items inside, and it made it to me without any issues. Shipping was fast and the item looked exactly like the picture. I would have no problem ordering from them again.
customer_reviews.author: DJK30

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan for CASIO Pro Trek. It is the first time I purchased the analog style. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: RHTW

customer_reviews.title: Dope
customer_reviews.text: Really nice update to the other protreks. Slimline, sporty and nice enough to wear on occasions
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Stone

customer_reviews.title: Solid.
customer_reviews.text: Very robust and precise watch. Really usefull at the mountains. Storm alarm, barometer and altimeter works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Fendrik

customer_reviews.title: comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: All kinds of functions, comfortable to wear. good looking, everything you'd want in a sport watch
customer_reviews.author: Robert Drexler

customer_reviews.title: ... all that it says it will do and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Does all that it says it will do and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Casio PRW-6000Y-1ACR Pro Trek watch
customer_reviews.text: High quality watch. I am very pleased with it and would definitely buy again.. Has everything that I need for my outdoor activities of hiking, hunting and fishing.
customer_reviews.author: tlak

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality in a perfect size watch;  especially if G-Shock are too big and heavy for you
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, especially if you find the G-Shock to be too big and heavy for a daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Mircea Buzila

customer_reviews.title: This is a great watch. Better and cheaper than the titanium band
customer_reviews.text: Third Protrek. This is a great watch. Better and cheaper than the titanium band. This has carbon fiber. Very nice and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Troser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch but wishing was bigger than what it was described,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compass needs serious improvement.  Carry your own Compass as backup.
customer_reviews.text: For reading time and temps and altitude is good. But if you are depending on using the Compass.... bu hahahahahah. Compass is useless. the 'north' needle won't stay put. You activate the compass it will point the magnetic north one spot then it will spin to some other direction without me moving. And I am not on any structures or magnetic items in the area. I am outside the city limits. Since I am old fashioned, I am glad I still use my lensatic compass to guide my bearings when trekking in the woods. It is a rugged watch that can withstand mild hits and water but don't base your whole outdoor adventure just using this. Specially a compass.
customer_reviews.author: Dustyzon

customer_reviews.title: Made in Japan.
customer_reviews.text: There is a difference between my prw-6000y and the picture from internet.
customer_reviews.author: FengQilong

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended watch
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for around 6 months and it's been great! The watch face is durable (no scratches) and it is easy to set up. It's like having a Swiss Army a knife on your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Lupo

customer_reviews.title: It is realy good and handsome watch
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to keep clean due to the ıts black clour and thin dust keeping layers
customer_reviews.author: Erdal

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Does everything that it says and does it well. Tough too. Have had it up to 8,400 feet and the watch readings were accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Peter G

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I wanted and more. Great features and a great look. Very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: should be better
customer_reviews.text: The glow in the dark tips on the hands are ridiculously small. I don't like that the temp gauge only works OFF your wrist. The altitude accuracy has to be taken with a grain of salt. I live at sea level right at the ocean and the watch varies from -30 M to +30 M. Casio is a great maker, but the watch should be better for the price, I'm sorry
customer_reviews.author: R Hart

customer_reviews.title: This is my go to watch when out on adventures:-)
customer_reviews.text: The best protek ever! Once calibrated it is dime on and tough as nails
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: expensive casio junk.
customer_reviews.text: Brand new 386.00 dollar watch and the second hand does not work.
customer_reviews.author: alan case

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous watch, exactly what I wanted. The hands are easy to read the time, and after a day or so i understand the mechanics of all the functions on the watch. At first, it seemed daunting all the options, but Casio actually has a logical common thread to access each feature. It is very light weight and is great looking. I have yet to test the altimeter feature, but will be traveling to Salt Lake City and will test the barometric pressure and altimeter functions. This is the perfect watch for me, especially for my hunting trip this November to Montana.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R. Walo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great watch; only downside is the illumination (light) is not very bright. Still give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick

customer_reviews.title: nicWorth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch. Does a lot of things. Very light. Comfortable. Only negative thing I can say is the picture was green on amazon but they sent a orange one
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: A Serious Watch
customer_reviews.text: A serious watch with great functionality. The 3rd generation sensors provide the ABC functions flawlessly in a thinner (12mm) watch thickness. The LED screen provides significant additional information, when needed. Atomic time sync and solar power, alarms, timers and compass headings... what more could you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: rbohl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good and it is another kind of 'smart' device.
customer_reviews.author: ZHULIANG YE

customer_reviews.title: Everything perfect. Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Received watch in 2 days. Everything perfect. Great looking watch, size and weight! This version is the best. Make sure you check the specs on this version. The best. Also the strap and watch are from Japan. Could not be happier. Check this one out!
customer_reviews.author: CSC

customer_reviews.title: then thewatch is great
customer_reviews.text: First order arrived and had the orange accents verses the green as shown in the picture. The orange is hideous so returned and ordered a second. It appears I'm not the first to to have an orange arrive if you look at the other recent reviews.The 2nd one arrived with the green accents, however the negative LCD is nearly impossible to read in most lighting conditions and angles, so returned it as well. If you're not bothered by the negative LCD, then the watch is great, however if you want to be able to glance at the LCD and actually read it then opt for a version with the positive LCD.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. I gave it a three star because ...
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. I gave it a three star because they sent me the wrong watch (Orange instead of green). when i placed my order i wanted to send an email to Amazon to ensure i receive the right watch but didn't find a way to do so. Didn't return it because i have a hiking trip and i needed/wanted the watch, and honestly didn't mind the orange color so i decided to keep it. The watch it self is simply great quality. Looks great and have all the great functions i need..... be aware because most probably they will send you the wrong watch color .....
customer_reviews.author: Sara F. Jarrar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Can be worn in casual business settings without looking like an idiot.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S. Taggart

customer_reviews.title: Digital, self setting, solar--but wait, there's more!
customer_reviews.text: One day the minute hand was off by 30 minutes--digital was correct--Overnight it corrected itself. Sets for daylight saving and back. Lots of useful stuff even if you don't dive.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Cantor, MD

customer_reviews.title: Not worth anything more than $25.00
customer_reviews.text: IT stopped working after a couple of months, and I had it repaired by Casio. And a day ago, just over 6 months after buying, the same problem happened again. There is nothing tough about this watch. Not worth anything more than $25.00.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Jainarine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing looking watch that is accurate and hassle free.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful watch. Green accent looks amazing. Solar powered and atomic time sync means no hassles of battery replacement which leaves half of my watches unused at any point in time. So many easy to use features makes it a desirable watch. I still I need to test all the sensors for accuracy but initial check seemed to indicate very good accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Meister

customer_reviews.title: My third pathfinder, the best so far!
customer_reviews.text: compared to previous pathfinders this one is lighter, easier to read, sensors are more accurate, controls are more intuitives. Overall the watch looks more professional.
customer_reviews.author: Juan F Gonzalez

product_meta.title: Casio Men's Pro Trek Quartz Watch with Resin Strap, Black, 16 (Model: PRW6000Y-1ACR)
product_meta.description:
Casio Protrek PRW6000Y-1A Atomic Solar Wristwatch



CasioWith the launch of its first watch in November 1974, Casio entered the wristwatch market at a time when the watch industry had just discovered digital technology. As a company with cutting-edge electronic technology developed for pocket calculators, Casio entered this field confident that it could develop timepieces that would lead the market.

Today, Casio is focusing its efforts on solar-powered radio-controlled watches: the built-in solar battery eliminates the nuisance of replacing batteries, atomic timekeeping means the users never have to reset the time. Recently, Casio launched a series of Bluetooth watches that sync to the users cell phone to automatically update the time. Casio is always moving time forward.



The PRWS6000Y PROTREK feature’s an analog-digital display and Version 3 Triple Sensor technology. In addition to its fast & precise sensors for taking bearing, altitude, and barometric pressure readings, it’s also capable of alerting the wearer to significant changes in barometric pressure by an alarm and a unique indicator on the digital display. An auto hand shift feature momentarily moves hands away of the digital window when you check displayed reading’s, this makes them easier to read during certain time in the day when the hands would be covering the digital display. Other features include dual LED illumination of the face and digital display, Smart Access, Tough Solar, radio-controlled timekeeping and more. Everything about this watch is designed and engineered to make it the ultimate in ease of operation and reliability. All this multi-functionality is packed into a slim profile 12.8 mm case. The PRWS6000Y also has a resin band and sapphire crystal for outstanding durability and long life. Module 5365

See more
